channel.title: Help with ::master
channel.description:
[center]Hello moparscape[/center] [center]i have a problem im using z508 and i wana get rid of ::lvl and put ::master is it possible to do it cuz there been alot of ppl glitching and get like 250 str and other stats pls help
Thanks Black Raider[/center]

item.title: Help with ::master
item.dc:creator: @cuz cuz
item.description:
@cuz wrote:

In the snippet of code you posted, change “lvl” to “master”.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ::master
item.dc:creator: @BlackRaider BlackRaider
item.description:
@BlackRaider wrote:

it doesnt work look at the ::lvl command

if (cmd[0].equals(“lvl”)) {
Misc.println("cmd: “+playerCommand+” "+cmd[0]);
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 9) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Fletching guide.”);
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 16) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 15) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 14) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 13) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 12) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 10) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot level this skill”);
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 17) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Thieving guide.”);
return;
}
p.appendExperience(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
}

Read full topic
